data.title: The Museo del Traje of Madrid and the Palais Galliera de Paris join forces in the celebration of the "Saison Espagnole" of fashion
data.meta_description: In this event organized by the French institution and dedicated to Spanish fashion through three exhibitions, this week the exhibition "Costumes Espagnoles, entre ombre et lumière" opens at the Maison Victor Hugo in Paris, for which the Museum of the Costume has lent an important number of pieces fr
data.text: In this event organized by the French institution and dedicated to Spanish fashion through three exhibitions, this week the exhibition "Costumes Espagnoles, entre ombre et lumière" opens at the Maison Victor Hugo in Paris, for which the Museum of the Costume has lent an important number of pieces from its collection of traditional costumes, dating from the eighteenth to the twentieth centuries. The exhibition will be open to the public from Wednesday June 21st to September 24th. For those of you who will be around Paris any time on that period, it’s something you cannot miss!
